objectives.name: Go to your room
objectives.description: This day needs to end. I want to lie in bed.

objectives.name: Find the ritual items
objectives.description: I should gather the items that I'll need for the ritual. Shouldn't be too hard.

children.name: Something red to draw
children.description: I need to find something red to paint or mark the front of the house with.

children.name: Something red to tie
children.description: I need to find something red to tie onto the phone cord.

objectives.name: Prepare the ritual
objectives.description: I need to prepare the ritual before night time.

children.name: Paint symbol
children.description: I need to paint a symbol on the front door of the house. I hope no one will see me...

children.name: Tie string on phone cord
children.description: I need to tie a red ribbon on the cord of my landline phone in the kitchen.

children.name: Set alarm clock
children.description: I need to set an alarm for midnight.

objectives.name: Get the ritual reversal instructions
objectives.description: I messed up the ritual. I need to undo it by following the steps I left at my PC.

objectives.name: Undo the ritual
objectives.description: I need to undo the ritual for my own safety.

objectives.name: Go to sleep
objectives.description: The ritual reversal is complete. There's nothing left to do other than to get in bed.

objectives.name: Talk to Hiro
objectives.description: I need to tell Hiro to leave the house...

objectives.name: Get in bed
objectives.description: Apparently, I need to lie in bed until the alarm goes off.

objectives.name: Call the Bus
objectives.description: I need to call the bus. The phone number I should dial is 999281#0.

objectives.name: Take the Bus
objectives.description: Get on the bus. Hurry!

objectives.name: Look Around
objectives.description: I arrived somewhere. What do I do now?

objectives.name: Explore the Forest
objectives.description: I arrived at my destination. Can I find someone to help me?

objectives.name: Rotate the Signs
objectives.description: I think I can open up a path towards the Daylight Gate if I rotate the blue signs towards the correct direction.

objectives.name: Open the Daylight Gate
objectives.description: There's a gate impeding my progress. I need to find a way to open it.

objectives.name: Enter the Locked Site
objectives.description: Seems like the only way north might be through the Locked Site.

objectives.name: Find a Light
objectives.description: Apparently, I'll' need a light to walk into the Locked Site.

objectives.name: Find 3 Keys
objectives.description:
I found clues to the location of the three keys for the padlocks:
-Behind a tree
-In a cactus pot
-Under a fake rug

objectives.name: Find an Exit
objectives.description: You're trapped inside the fairy ring. Find a way out!

objectives.name: Find a Head
objectives.description: Find a new head for Kozmo. Hurry, he seems in danger!

objectives.name: Give the new head to Kozmo
objectives.description: Kozmo needs his new head. Hurry!

objectives.name: Find the Lighthouse
objectives.description: By continuing north through the forest, I should be able to find the lighthouse at some point.

objectives.name: Find Paddles
objectives.description: There's a boat I can take to continue north, but I need paddles.

objectives.name: Get Rid of the Monster
objectives.description: There's a boat I can take to continue north, but a monster is guarding it.

objectives.name: Take the Boat
objectives.description: Taking the boat might be the only way to continue north.

objectives.name: Get Rid of the Caterpillar
objectives.description: The moths will reward me with a doorknob if I get rid of the it...

objectives.name: Get Your Reward
objectives.description: The moths should reward me with a doorknob now.

objectives.name: Use the Doorknob
objectives.description: I got a doorknob from the moths. It seems to be the only way forward.

objectives.name: Escape your prison
objectives.description: I woke up in a strange prison cell. I need to get out of here.

objectives.name: Investigate the facility
objectives.description: Explore this place.

objectives.name: Find a way to go deeper down
objectives.description: The only way out of the facility is by going deeper down, according to Rune.

objectives.name: Lower the water level
objectives.description: In order to go deeper, the water level may need to be lowered somehow.

objectives.name: Fix the elevator
objectives.description: In order to go deeper, the elevator could perhaps be fixed.

objectives.name: Find the cursed door
objectives.description: Rune said there should be a cursed door that leads outside, somewhere deep in this facility.

objectives.name: Find an exit
objectives.description: Find a way to leave this strange house.

objectives.name: Find your items
objectives.description: Find out what happened to your items and retrieve them.

objectives.name: Help Sai escape
objectives.description: Find a way to unlock the cage Sai is in.

objectives.name: Find and Unseal 5 Special Items
objectives.description: Miss Knives keeps 5 important items in her house. I need to find and unseal each of them.

objectives.name: Ask Spider What To Do Next
objectives.description: I have the 5 items, but I don't know what to do with them.

objectives.name: Find a Lighter
objectives.description: I need to find something to start a fire with.

objectives.name: Burn the 5 Special Items
objectives.description: I need to burn the items in the correct order. There's a fireplace I could use.

objectives.name: Bring Alcohol to the Plant
objectives.description: One of the plants requires alcohol (or water).

objectives.name: Bring Food to the Plant
objectives.description: One of the plants requires to be fed. Meat is recommended.

objectives.name: Play Music for the Plant
objectives.description: One of the plants requires music.

objectives.name: Bring Flowers to the Plant
objectives.description: One of the plants requires a flower crown.

objectives.name: Perform the Paper Lily ritual
objectives.description: In order to open the door, the letter needs to be folded into a paper lily and placed in the jar.

objectives.name: Go through the door
objectives.description: The door is open. I can go home.

objectives.name: Get to the Wardrobe
objectives.description: I can only wake up from these dreams when I reach the large wardrobe at the end.

objectives.name: Get to the Wardrobe
objectives.description: I can only wake up from these dreams when I reach the large wardrobe at the end.

objectives.name: Get to the Wardrobe
objectives.description: I can only wake up from these dreams when I reach the large wardrobe at the end.

objectives.name: Get to the Wardrobe
objectives.description: I can only wake up from these dreams when I reach the large wardrobe at the end.

objectives.name: Find a _____ for mom
objectives.description: It's in a closet in the garage.
